name: Beanz (Lil)
description: Beanz... Play as a potatore, run form fun farmers, and don't be a bean! Click [Space] to jump, and do NOT  fly too high or the game will reset, yes it is an intentional feature! This game was made under 10 minutes with one line of code. Enjoy, I worked really hard on this game. Current world record 9/11/22: Two
